subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Stephon Marbury’s new talk show, “Stars on Stars,” on Fox Sports Net, gives the Knicks’ point guard a different image, but it’s doubtful he wants to be seen as a star-struck host.
snippet: Stephon Marbury’s new talk show, “Stars on Stars,” on Fox Sports Net, gives the Knicks’ point guard a different image, but it’s doubtful he wants to be seen as a star-struck host.
